title: 客户端闪退显示这个~
author: lufei010623
txt_content: file:///D:\Documents\Tencent Files\1443197830\Image\Group\(75A`5NU~G~(1}WPEJQMLQJ.jpg就是这样的说。。。。偶尔能打开，但是这样怎么办？我想彻底解决

replies.author: lufei010623
replies.txt_content: 就是这个，该怎么办？我开着服务器呢，结果客户端闪退

replies.author: lufei010623
replies.txt_content:
Bimes O' Plenty uses a custom worldtype for its biomes.When creating a world, it may be enabled by clicking the 'World Type'button under'More World Options'until it displays'Biomes O' Plenty

Ther worldType can be used on severs by changing the 'level-type'insever.properties to 'BIOMESOP'(without quotes)

This message will only display once.
c盘图片不能上传lz不知道么…… 重新上传一下吧Σ( ° △ °|||)︴

replies.author: 竹月
replies.txt_content: 图挂了。。不过我猜测是你的整合包里有的mod不是很稳定，然后你用了个这个mod的方块（右键使用了或者是放到地上了或者是打开gui界面了），然后导致游戏不稳定，具体的还要等你图发出来再说
